original_title: โมราห์ บริสุทธิ์
overview: Morah has been betrayed by her boyfriend who sold her to a rich businessman. She kills the old man in self-defense and realizes how easy she can get away with murder. She then goes on a killing spree and murders any man who tries to lay their hands on her. However, a pretty police detective is on her trails.
title: Morah
